about.title: Building a Sustainable Future
about.subtitle: We're on a mission to make sustainability action accessible, engaging, and effective for individuals, businesses, and communities worldwide.
about.mission_text: To empower every person and organization to take meaningful climate action through gamified challenges, community support, and data-driven insights that make sustainability engaging and achievable.
about.vision_text: A world where sustainable living is the norm, not the exception. Where every individual feels empowered to make a difference and connected to a global community working toward a thriving planet.
about.global_impact_subtitle: Together, we're creating measurable change for our planet
about.values_subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
about.value_accessibility_desc: Making sustainability action accessible to everyone, regardless of background or resources
about.value_community_desc: Building strong communities where people support each other's sustainability journey
about.value_science_desc: All our recommendations are grounded in peer-reviewed climate science
about.value_improvement_desc: Always learning and evolving to maximize positive environmental impact
about.journey_subtitle: Key milestones in building the sustainability platform
about.team_subtitle: Passionate individuals dedicated to climate action
about.ready_subtitle: Join our global community and start your sustainability journey today. Every action counts, and together we can create lasting change.

handprint.methodology.title: Calculation Methodology
handprint.methodology.subtitle: How we calculate your positive environmental impact
handprint.methodology.dialog_desc: Understand the science behind your handprint calculations
handprint.methodology.intro: Our handprint calculator uses internationally recognized emission factors and scientific research to accurately measure your positive environmental impact. All calculations are based on peer-reviewed studies and data from leading environmental organizations.
handprint.methodology.tree_standard_desc: One tree absorbs approximately 21.77 kg of COâ‚‚ per year according to the European Environment Agency. We use this as our standard conversion factor.
handprint.methodology.factors_desc: Each activity type uses specific emission factors validated by scientific research
handprint.methodology.energy_desc: Based on average grid emission intensity. Saving 1 kWh of electricity prevents 0.4 kg of COâ‚‚ emissions from entering the atmosphere.
handprint.methodology.transport_desc: Calculated as avoided car emissions. Cycling or using public transport instead of driving a car saves 0.21 kg COâ‚‚ per kilometer.
handprint.methodology.food_desc: Average COâ‚‚ impact of plant-based meals vs. meat-based meals. Choosing sustainable food reduces emissions by approximately 2.5 kg per meal.
handprint.methodology.waste_desc: Recycling prevents emissions from manufacturing new products. Each kilogram of recycled waste saves 2.1 kg COâ‚‚.
handprint.methodology.water_desc: Water treatment and heating energy. Saving water reduces emissions by 0.4 grams of COâ‚‚ per liter.
handprint.methodology.example.transport: 15 km by bike instead of car = 3.15 kg COâ‚‚ saved
handprint.methodology.example.food: 3 plant-based meals this week = 7.5 kg COâ‚‚ saved
handprint.methodology.example.waste: 5 kg waste recycled = 10.5 kg COâ‚‚ prevented
handprint.methodology.multipliers_desc: Your impact grows when you inspire others and maintain consistency
handprint.methodology.community_effect_d: When you share your actions and inspire others, your impact multiplies. Studies show that sustainable behaviors spread through social networks.
handprint.methodology.streak_bonus_desc: Maintaining daily sustainable habits creates lasting change. Your streak multiplies your impact as consistency leads to greater results.
handprint.methodology.validation_intro: Our methodology is continuously validated against the latest scientific research:
handprint.methodology.validation_1: Emission factors are updated quarterly based on IEA, EPA, and EEA data
handprint.methodology.validation_2: All calculations undergo peer review by environmental scientists
handprint.methodology.validation_3: Regional adjustments are made for local energy grid compositions
handprint.methodology.validation_4: Conservative estimates ensure we never overstate your impact
handprint.methodology.disclaimer_text: These calculations provide estimates based on average values. Actual COâ‚‚ savings may vary depending on specific circumstances, regional factors, and individual behaviors. Our goal is to provide meaningful insights while maintaining scientific accuracy.
